function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mass deployment of the system in large shopping malls","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to large gatherings and crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures and social distancing guidelines in the shopping malls","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring with AI-powered social distancing detection","People":"Public visitors, shoppers, and mall staff","Owner":"Mall management and local health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of real-time performance hardware with low accuracy in social distancing monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate monitoring may lead to undetected violations of social distancing guidelines and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Deploy high-accuracy real-time monitoring hardware and software","Technologies":"Deep learning models with high accuracy in social distancing detection","People":"System developers, hardware manufacturers, and system implementers","Owner":"System developers and implementers"},{"Description":"Failure of social distancing monitoring models with low speed","Impact":"Models with low speed may not detect violations of social distancing in real-time, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spread","Mitigation":"Select high-speed models with reliable accuracy for real-time social distancing monitoring","Technologies":"Fast and accurate object detection models for social distancing detection","People":"System developers, hardware manufacturers, and system implementers","Owner":"System developers and implementers"}]}
